item.title: 香港考虑制定金融领域使用人工智能的规则
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港政府正准备就人工智能在金融领域的应用发布首份政策声明，此举可能会促进人工智能技术在交易、投资银行和加密货币等领域的应用。【原文：The Hong Kong government is preparing to issue its maiden policy statement on the use of artificial intelligence in finance, according to people familiar with the matter, a move that could catalyze the use of the technology in areas from trading to investment banking and cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 美国敲定对华关税，马来西亚手套制造商业绩大增
item.description: 在美国有望于本月敲定对中国商品征收关税后，包括 Top Glove 公司在内的马来西亚手套制造商股价大涨。【原文：Malaysia glove maker shares including Top Glove Corp. surged after the US was expected to finalize tariffs on Chinese goods this month.】

item.title: Cosan 旗下 Moove 润滑油公司在美国首次公开募股申请中显示收入增长
item.description: 巴西企业集团 Cosan SA 旗下的 Moove Lubricants Holdings 申请在美国首次公开募股，并披露了不断增长的收入。【原文：Moove Lubricants Holdings, a unit of Brazil conglomerate Cosan SA, filed for a US initial public offering, disclosing growing revenue.】

item.title: 星展集团大中华区半流通基金销售额增长 300
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）的半流动性基金产品今年在大中华区的销售额激增，预计随着投资者增加对另类资产的配置，需求将保持高位。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. saw sales of its semi-liquid fund products to Greater China spike this year and expects demand to remain high as investors boost allocation for alternative assets.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Regal 出价收购铂金资产管理公司
item.description: Philip King 的 Regal Partners Ltd. 提议收购竞争对手 Platinum Asset Management Ltd.，因为这家对冲基金正在继续扩张，其资产在短短两年内增长了两倍多。【原文：Philip King’s Regal Partners Ltd. offered to buy rival Platinum Asset Management Ltd. as the hedge fund presses on with an expansion push that’s seen assets more than triple in just two years.】

item.title: 需求担忧持续，美联储决议前石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 由于市场普遍预期美联储本周将降息，但需求前景恶化的担忧抵消了降息的影响，石油价格保持稳定。【原文：Oil steadied as a widely expected interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve this week was offset by concerns the demand outlook is deteriorating.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。债券交易员对美联储本周的减息幅度分歧很大。亚马逊正计划减少其经理人数量。贝莱德正在全面改革其私人信贷业务。【原文：Good morning. Bond traders are deeply divided about how much the Fed will cut this week. Amazon is planning to reduce how many managers it has. And BlackRock is overhauling its private-credit business.—Nicole Bullock】

item.title: 中国家电巨头美的融资 40 亿美元后将在香港上市交易
item.description: 中国家电巨头美的集团股份有限公司（Midea Group Co.【原文：Chinese appliance giant Midea Group Co. will start trading in Hong Kong after robust demand for the biggest public stock offering in three years revived hopes for the city’s languishing market.】

item.title: 即使银行持怀疑态度，韩国仍对进入债券指数抱有希望
item.description: 一位高级政府官员表示，韩国 "积极期待 "该国债券下个月被纳入一个重要的全球债务指数，尽管一些主要银行表示这一次不太可能实现。【原文：South Korea is “positively expecting” the country’s bonds to be included in a key global debt index next month, a senior government official says, even as some major banks say it’s unlikely to happen this time around.】

item.title: 香港地产股将因美联储举措和更多租房者而上扬
item.description: 由于预期美国降息将促进房地产购买，交易商押注香港开发商股价反弹。【原文：Traders are betting on a rebound in Hong Kong developers’ shares, anticipating that a US interest rate cut will boost property purchases.】

item.title: 美联储决议前亚洲股市承压：市场综述
item.description: 周二早盘，在华尔街涨跌不一的交易时段后，大多数亚洲股市准备下跌。【原文：Most Asian stocks were poised for declines early Tuesday following a mixed session on Wall Street where traders boosted bets the Federal Reserve will this week deliver a half-point rate cut.】

item.title: 美国称谷歌将广告初创公司视为 "威胁 "并将其收购
item.description: 反垄断执法人员在周一的庭审中试图证明，谷歌之所以在 2011 年收购广告技术提供商 AdMeld，是因为这家搜索巨头认为这家初创公司对其在线展示广告战略构成了 "威胁"。【原文：Google bought advertising technology provider AdMeld in 2011 because the search giant saw the startup as a “threat” to its online display ad strategy, antitrust enforcers sought to show at trial Monday.】

item.title: 微软宣布回购 600 亿美元，股息提高 10
item.description: 微软公司公布了一项价值 600 亿美元的新股票回购计划，这是该公司有史以来最大的回购授权，并将季度股息提高了 10%。【原文：Microsoft Corp. unveiled a new $60 billion stock-buyback program, matching its largest-ever repurchase authorization, and raised its quarterly dividend 10%.】

item.title: InterCement 达成协议开始庭外重组
item.description: 陷入困境的水泥生产商 InterCement Participacoes SA 与部分债权人达成协议，开始庭外重组。【原文：Distressed cement maker InterCement Participacoes SA reached an agreement with some of its creditors to begin an out-of-court restructuring.】

item.title: 贝莱德调整私人信贷业务，追逐行业领先者
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. is overhauling its private credit business as the world’s largest asset manager races to catch up to competitors in the booming market.】

item.title: 津巴布韦债权人酝酿以债务换气候来解决拖欠问题
item.description: 作为 210 亿美元欠款重组的一部分，津巴布韦的债权人可能愿意考虑与该国进行债务换气候。【原文：Zimbabwe’s creditors may be willing to consider a debt-for-climate swap with the nation as part of a restructure of its $21 billion arrears.】

item.title: 英特尔将为亚马逊生产定制人工智能芯片，推迟德国工厂的建设
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp.英特尔公司首席执行官帕特-盖尔辛格（Pat Gelsinger）已将亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：Intel Corp. Chief Executive Officer Pat Gelsinger has landed Amazon.com Inc.’s AWS as a customer for the company’s manufacturing business, potentially bringing work to new plants under construction in the US and boosting his efforts to turn around the embattled chipmaker.】

item.title: 特百惠品牌计划申请破产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，特百惠品牌公司准备最快于本周申请破产。【原文：Tupperware Brands is preparing to file for bankruptcy as soon as this week, according to people with knowledge of the plans, following a years-long effort to revive the business amid waning demand.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行聘请摩根士丹利的帕特森负责信息服务 M&A 部
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）从摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）聘请了资深信息服务银行家罗布-帕特森（Rob Patterson），负责数据和信息投资银行业务。【原文：Barclays Plc has hired veteran information services banker Rob Patterson from Morgan Stanley to lead data and information investment banking coverage.】

item.title: 中央太平洋接近达成夏威夷电力银行交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中央太平洋金融公司（Central Pacific Financial Corp. ）正在与一些知名的另类资产管理公司洽谈融资事宜，以帮助从夏威夷电力公司（Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc.【原文：Central Pacific Financial Corp. is in talks to raise money from some well-known alternative asset managers to help buy rival American Savings Bank FSB from Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc., the utility owner grappling with huge losses in the aftermath of last year’s wildfires on Maui, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 梅奥称银行债券走强为其股票提供支撑
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）分析师迈克-梅奥（Mike Mayo）说，为美国银行发行的债券利差收窄，表明信贷投资者认为风险降低，股票投资者应该注意这种看法。【原文：Tightening spreads on bonds issued for US banks is signaling that credit investors see less risk there, a perception equity investors should heed, says Wells Fargo & Co. analyst Mike Mayo.】

item.title: 巴克莱预计美联储作出关键决定前美元将反弹 1
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）外汇策略师斯凯拉-蒙哥马利-科宁（Skylar Montgomery Koning）表示，由于交易商高估了美联储降息的幅度，低估了周二即将公布的零售销售报告，美元有望反弹。【原文：The dollar is poised to rally, as traders are overestimating the extent of Federal Reserve rate cuts and underestimating a retail sales report coming on Tuesday, said Skylar Montgomery Koning, a foreign-exchange strategist at Barclays.】

item.title: 英特尔确认国防部芯片法案拨款 30 亿美元
item.description: 英特尔公司周一表示，它有资格获得多达 30 亿美元的美国政府资助，为军方生产芯片，这证实了彭博社早些时候的报道。【原文：Intel Corp. said on Monday that it’s eligible to receive as much as $3 billion in US government funding to manufacture chips for the military, confirming earlier reporting by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 被胡塞武装袭击的油轮在海上航行四周后被拖走
item.description: 一艘在红海遭到胡塞武装分子袭击的油轮在近四周后被拖往安全区域。【原文：An oil tanker in the Red Sea that was struck by Houthi militants was towed to a safe area after almost four weeks.】

item.title: 丹-弗莱德金重燃收购埃弗顿俱乐部的兴趣
item.description: 知情人士透露，美国亿万富翁丹-弗莱德金（Dan Friedkin）在对这家英格兰足球超级联赛俱乐部的兴趣降温约两个月后，再次启动了收购埃弗顿俱乐部的计划。【原文：US billionaire Dan Friedkin has reignited his plan to buy Everton FC, people with knowledge of the matter said, roughly two months after cooling his interest in the English Premier League club.】

item.title: 班普燃气公司 BKV 在美国首次公开募股中寻求高达 3.15 亿美元的投资
item.description: 泰国煤炭和电力公司 Banpu Pcl 旗下的一个天然气生产部门正寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集高达 3.15 亿美元的资金。【原文：A gas-producing unit of Banpu Pcl, a Thai coal and power company, is seeking to raise as much as $315 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 高盛交易员称现在是买入人工智能股的时候了
item.description: 人工智能相关股票最近受到了打击，但由于利率即将下调，而且基本面依然强劲，高盛集团的交易部门认为现在是逢低买入的时候了。【原文：Artificial intelligence-related stocks have taken a beating recently, but with lower interest rates on the way and fundamentals remaining strong, Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s trading desk thinks it’s time to buy the dip.】

item.title: Cherry 金融科技公司推销与 "先买后付 "整容贷款挂钩的债券
item.description: 据知情人士透露，随着医疗债务需求的激增，支付公司 Cherry Technologies 正在为一种债券寻找投资者，这种债券将与整容手术和其他美容治疗的 "即买即还 "贷款挂钩。【原文：Payment company Cherry Technologies is sounding out investors for a bond that would be tied to “buy-now, pay-later” loans for cosmetic surgery and other aesthetic treatments, as demand for medical debt surges, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克称将进一步降息但不会太快
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）表示，欧洲中央银行将进一步放宽货币政策，但由于通胀风险挥之不去，不应操之过急。【原文：The European Central Bank will ease monetary policy further, though it shouldn’t do so too hastily due to lingering inflation risks, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 英国石油公司寻求专注于核心业务以提高投资者兴趣
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）周一宣布，计划出售其在美国的陆上风电业务，因为这家油气巨头正在缩减其在可再生能源领域的风险敞口，并专注于其核心业务。【原文：BP Plc on Monday announced plans to sell its onshore wind business in the US as the oil and gas giant scales back its exposure to renewables and focuses on its core business.】
